description: This week, Stephen T. Stone takes both top spots on the insightful side. In first place, it’s a preemptive comment on our post about five Section 230 cases that made online communities better: In second place, it’s a comment about laws that aim to ban library books: The best libraries offend everyone. The worst libraries […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
